import{useEffect}from"react";import{useLocation}from"react-router-dom";const AnalyticsPageView=()=>{const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{// Send page view event to Google Analytics
window.gtag("event","page_view",{page_location:location.pathname});window.scrollTo(0,0);},[location]);return null;};export default AnalyticsPageView;
